alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Carroll; Livingston (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 7:27PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Carroll, Caldwell and southwestern Livingston Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 727 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Braymer, or 8 miles southeast of Hamilton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Hamilton, Braymer, Polo, Breckenridge, Kingston, Utica, Cowgill, Ludlow, Mooresville and Dawn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central and west central Missouri.
